org.treetank.revisioning

Interface IRevisioning

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Differential, FullDump, Incremental

    public interface IRevisioning
    This interface offers methods to revision data differently.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IRevisioning.IRevisioningFactory
      Factory for generating an IRevisioning-instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NodePage combinePages(NodePage[] pages)
      Method to reconstruct a complete NodePage with the help of party filled pages plus a revision-delta which determines the necessary steps back.
      NodePageContainer combinePagesForModification(NodePage[] pages)
      Method to reconstruct a complete NodePage for reading as well as a NodePage for serializing with the Nodes to write already on there.
      int getRevisionsToRestore()
      Getting the numbers of necessary revisions to restore.

    • Method Detail

      • combinePages

        NodePage combinePages(NodePage[] pages)
        Method to reconstruct a complete NodePage with the help of party filled pages plus a revision-delta which determines the necessary steps back.
        Parameters:
        pages - the base of the complete Nodepage
        revToRestore - the revision needed to build up the complete milestone.
        Returns:
        the complete NodePage

      • combinePagesForModification

        NodePageContainer combinePagesForModification(NodePage[] pages)
        Method to reconstruct a complete NodePage for reading as well as a NodePage for serializing with the Nodes to write already on there.
        Parameters:
        pages - the base of the complete Nodepage
        mileStoneRevision - the revision needed to build up the complete milestone.
        Returns:
        a NodePageContainer holding a complete NodePage for reading a one for writing

      • getRevisionsToRestore

        int getRevisionsToRestore()
        Getting the numbers of necessary revisions to restore.
        Returns:
        the number of revisions to restore.
